metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12471 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Wikimedia MediaWiki 1.30.0 through 1.32.1 has XSS. Loading user JavaScript from a non-existent account allows anyone to create the account, and perform XSS on users loading that script. Fixed in 1.32.2, 1.31.2, 1.30.2 and 1.27.6.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
